General.Name: CuriosityStream Inc
General.Description: CuriosityStream Inc. operates as an independent factual media company. It offers documentaries and series about science, technology, history, society, lifestyle, nature, and others. The company was formerly known as Software Acquisition Group Inc. and changed its name to CuriosityStream Inc. The company is based in Silver Spring, Maryland.
General.Address: 8484 Georgia Avenue, Silver Spring, MD, United States, 20910
